actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram Trail in Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the Bartram Trail as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to authorize a feasibility study relating to the Bartram Trail in Alabama.
